 2008-15082008-08-28,  ,  ,  ,  ND
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisSEX OFFENDER INFORMATION REGISTRATION REGULATIONS (CANADIAN FORCES) to establish the mechanisms by which sex offenders who are subject to the Code of Service Discipline or are officiers or non-commissioned members of the Primary Reserve are registered using Canadian Forces registration centres located both in and outside of Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0247 Publication Date: 2008-09-17
